fields.title: KKT conditions
fields.pointers:
* Applications in machine learning and statistics:
** Applying the conditions to  [support vector machines (SVMs)](svm_optimality_conditions)  is critical to show sparsity, the property that lets them be kernelized.
fields.summary: The Karush-Kuhn-Tucker (KKT) conditions are a set of optimality conditions for optimization problems in terms of the optimization variables and Lagrange multipliers.
